# Feature Spec: [FEATURE NAME]

**Feature Branch**: `[###-feature-name]` • **Created**: [DATE] • **Status**: Draft

## Summary
One paragraph describing what changes and why it matters. Keep it product-facing.

## Goals
- Bullet the outcomes this feature must deliver (≤4 items).

## Non-Goals
- Bullet anything explicitly out of scope so the team can defer it.

## User Scenario
Describe a single narrative that shows the user (or operator) achieving the goal with this feature.

## Functional Requirements
List numbered, testable requirements (FR-001, FR-002, …). Focus on observable behavior, not implementation detail.

## Dependencies
Call out specs, systems, or teams this feature relies on.

---
*Tips*: trim filler, prefer concrete language, link to supporting context when useful.
